====== DESCRIPTION ======

Times Square Arts invites you to submit original moving-image artwork to Midnight Moment, the worldâ€™s largest, longest-running digital art exhibition synchronized on electronic billboards and Newspaper Kiosks throughout Times Square nightly from 11:57pm to midnight.
Deadline for submissions: June 30, 2019.
Learn more about submission guidelines here: TSq.org/MMSubmission.


===== INSTRUCTIONS =====

Open applications for the Midnight Moment program are accepted through the online Slideroom portal. Please review submission guidelines and access the portal here: TSq.org/MMSubmission.

If you have any questions about your proposal, please email Public Art Manager Hillary Dvorkin at hdvorkin@tsq.org.
